art.author: amylisa
art.post: I am glad to find your blog here.  I just read Heaven Is For Real, and also looked up Akiane’s painting.  I immediately thought of the image of Jesus from the Lost 40 Days special that recently aired.  To me the faces look the same!  Especially Ray Downing’s picture, Jesus in Glory.  Wow….very similar.
art.title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
